required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dermatological Evaluation of Topical Compatibility, Primary Skin Irritability, Accumulated Skin Irritability, and Dermal Sensitisation
clinical_study.official_title: Dermatological Evaluation of Topical Compatibility, Primary Skin Irritability, Accumulated Skin Irritability, and Dermal Sensitisation

brief_summary.textblock: Check the safety under normal conditions of use through the verification of emergence signs of irritability and sensitisation of the genital mucosa.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of adverse effects in maximized conditions

study_pop.textblock: Patients with age from 18 to 70 years old, with skin color varying between clear caucasian to dark.
